document_data.name: Umel Shorntooth
document_data.mainbody: '''Umel Shorntooth''' was a retired adventurer who lived in the "Royal Keep" of [[Mistshaws]] in [[Eskorn]], [[Laerakond]].
document_data.Activities: In [[1479 DR]], Umel was searching for adventurers to accompany him, despite his advanced age, in an expedition to the ruins of [[Savanfast]], which he had visited when he was young.
